item.description: About me Online, I go by the pseudonym Pluja. I am a dedicated Linux user and I have a strange love for cibersecurity. At the moment, Iâ€™m a university student studying to obtain my Degree in Computer Science with a concentration in Systems. Currently I am working on several personal projects like kycnot, Parasitter or CloackMe. I also run a website where I try to concern users about the importance of privacy (it’s in spanish!
